rules_text:
Prowess
Each instant and sorcery card with mana value 3 or less in your hand has inscribe. The inscribe cost is equal to its mana cost increased by {1{U}R}. [i](Pay that card's mana cost increased by {1{U}R}: Exile that card from your hand inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)[/i]
